head.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to add {{FileFormatUp}} document joining capabilities to your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.

header.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables you to develop {{EnvNameShort}} applications that efficiently join multiple {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. It allows you to join, split, extract, reorder, and remove pages from documents easily.

more_features.title: Document joining tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports more than 50 common business file formats, providing a range of document processing features.

feature_1.title: Join different document formats
feature_1.content: Join documents such as PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Specify which pages to include for precise results.

feature_2.title: Page management
feature_2.content: Easily move, remove, or reorder selected pages to structure your documents as needed.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages at any angle and switch between landscape and portrait orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract pages from a document, saving them as a separate file.

formats.title: Join various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, making document processing efficient and flexible.

examples.comment_2: Join the document with another file
examples.comment_3: Save the joined document to the desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides an easy way to join {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications by combining multiple files into one.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the second file to join.
content.step_4: Join the files and save the output.

code_1.title: Join specific pages from different document formats
code_1.content: This example shows how to join {{FileFormatUp}} files while selecting specific pages from other formats.
code_1.comment_2: Define options for selecting specific pages
code_1.comment_3: Join the main document with selected pages from another file
code_1.comment_4: Save the joined document to a new location
